passwordHint: Min 8 chars ¬∑ uppercase ¬∑ lowercase ¬∑ number ¬∑ special character
login.welcome: Welcome back! Sign in to continue.
login.leftDesc: Connect with certified experts, test your soil, and grow smarter.
registerSubtitle: Join thousands of farmers transforming agriculture with smart technology.
expertApprovalNote: Expert accounts require admin approval before activation.
expertPendingApproval: Your expert request has been submitted. Please wait for admin approval.
registerSuccess: Registration successful! You can now login.
register.leftDesc: Join farmers and experts building smarter agriculture across Nepal.

otp.subtitle: Enter the 6-digit OTP we sent to your email address to activate your account.
otp.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
otp.newOtpSent: New OTP sent! Please check your email.
otp.failedToResendRetry: Failed to resend. Please try again.

forgot.step1Desc: Enter your registered email address and we'll send you an OTP to reset your password.
forgot.sendOtpError: Failed to send OTP. Please try again.
forgot.resetError: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
forgot.successDesc: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.

description: Smart agriculture solutions powered by technology.
expertHeroTitle: Grow Your Career as a Soil Testing Expert
expertHeroDesc: Help farmers make better decisions by providing professional soil testing services. Expand your expertise, build credibility, and earn a stable income.
expertHow1: Register as a soil testing expert by submitting your profile.
expertHow2: Receive assignments based on your location and skills.
expertHow3: Visit farms, collect soil samples, and perform lab tests.
expertHow4: Upload reports and communicate results with farmers.
expertHow5: Earn income and grow your professional reputation.
expertBenefit1: Regular assignments to keep you engaged and earning.
expertBenefit2: Stable income while helping farmers succeed.
expertBenefit3: Safety and quality support from the platform.
expertBenefit4: Access to training on soil testing and analytics.
expertBenefit5: Network with other experts for collaboration.
expertBenefit6: Long-term growth: become verified, lead a team, or start your own service.
expertWho1: Service Providers: Soil labs, agricultural consultants, environmental analysts.
expertWho2: Individual Technicians: Certified or non-certified, self-employed, or seeking opportunities.
expertWho3: Anyone passionate about helping farmers and growing professionally.
expertFaqA2: Training is available but not mandatory.
expertFaqA3: Payments are securely transferred after assignment completion.
expertFaqQ4: Is there a cost to join?
expertFaqA4: Joining as an expert is completely free.

passwordValidation.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
passwordValidation.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
passwordValidation.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
passwordValidation.number: Password must contain at least one number.
passwordValidation.specialChar: Password must contain at least one special character.

googleValidation.required: Google account is required for this action.
googleValidation.failed: Google authentication failed. Please try again.

passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
passwordUpperCase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter.
passwordLowerCase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter.
passwordNumber: Must contain at least one number.
passwordSpecialChar: Must contain at least one special character (!@#$%^&*).
googleError: Google signup failed. Please try again.
googleNoUserData: Failed to retrieve user information from Google.
googleAuthError: An error occurred during Google authentication.
userAlreadyExists: An account with this email already exists.
homeDescription: Book soil tests easily and receive intelligent fertilizer and crop recommendations tailored to your land.
featureBookingDesc: Schedule soil testing appointments quickly from anywhere.
featureSoilAnalysisDesc: Analyze pH, NPK levels, and soil health indicators efficiently.
featureRecommendationDesc: Receive crop and fertilizer suggestions based on soil data.
readyToImprove: Ready to Improve Your Soil Health?
readyToImproveDesc: Join thousands of farmers who are already transforming their agricultural practices
coreFeaturesTitle: Everything You Need for Better Farming
coreFeaturesSubtitle: Comprehensive tools and services to optimize your agricultural operations
fieldServicesSubtitle: Book skilled field service teams for every stage of your agricultural cycle
harvestingDesc: Efficient and timely crop harvesting support to maximize yield and reduce loss.
seedingDesc: Professional planting and seeding assistance ensuring proper spacing and growth.
landPrepDesc: Expert ploughing and field preparation services to enhance soil productivity.
bookingSoilTestSubtitle: Schedule an expert to collect soil samples directly from your field.
notesPlaceholder: e.g., The field is near the big Peepal tree. Please call when you arrive.
paymentCollectionNote: will be collected at the time of sample collection in the field.
needHelpText: Contact our support team for assistance with booking or any questions.
pleaseSelectLocation: Please select complete location (Province, District, Municipality, Ward)
chatWelcomeDesc: Ask me anything about agriculture, crops, soil, fertilizers, pest control, and farming practices.
chatDisclaimer: AI responses are for guidance only. Consult agricultural experts for critical decisions.
chatError: Sorry, I couldn't process your message. Please try again.
chatSuggestion2: How to control pests in vegetables?
chatSuggestion5: How much fertilizer to apply in wheat?
chatWelcomeSub1: Ask us any question about farming and agriculture.
chatWelcomeSub2: I am always ready to give you accurate information.
chatDailyTip: Today's Tip: Apply fertilizers on time to increase production.
